Name: issue-invoice-editor
Label: Issue Invoice Editor

Components.Label: ShipmentInvoice
Status
Progress
Currency
Print Invoice
Components.Query:
select MasterData.Name as CustomerType,de.Name as Department,Partner.Address AS addresscus,sales.PhoneNumber AS telsales,sales.Email AS email,sales.NickName AS nickname,de.Name as Department,ct.JobTitles AS JobTitles ,ct.ContactName AS ContactName ,ct.ContactPhoneNumber AS telcus, (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT(cont.Name, ' x ', Round(InquiryContainer.Quantity,0)), ' & ') as ContainerText
FROM InquiryContainer
LEFT JOIN MasterData cont ON InquiryContainer.ContainerTypeId = cont.Id
WHERE InquiryId = '{Id}') as ContainerText
from Inquiry
left join Partner on Inquiry.CustomerId = Partner.Id
left join MasterData on Partner.CustomerTypeId = MasterData.Id
LEFT JOIN PartnerContact ct ON ct.PartnerId = Partner.Id
LEFT JOIN [USER] sales on dbo.Partner.SaleId = sales.Id 
left join [User] u on u.Id = '{TokenUserId}'
left join MasterData de on de.Id = u.DepartmentId
where Inquiry.Id = '{Id}'

select concat(pol.Name,pod.Name) as Level1,detail.GroupFee, pol.Name as Pol,pod.Name as Pod,fee.Name as Description,otherUnit.Name as Unit,curr.Code as Curr,
(select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%LCL%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId)+ 
isnull((select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%ALL%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId),0) as LCL,
Round((select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%20%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId)+ 
isnull((select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%ALL%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId),0),{CTotalPrice}) as Cont20,
(select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%40%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId)
+ 
isnull((select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%ALL%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId),0)+ 
isnull((select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%ALL%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId),0) as Cont40,
(select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%45%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId)
+ 
isnull((select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%ALL%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId),0) as Cont45
from InquiryDetail detail
left join Terminal pol on detail.PolId = pol.Id
left join Terminal pod on detail.PodId = pod.Id
left join MasterData curr on detail.CurrencyId = curr.Id
left join FeeType fee on detail.DescriptionId = fee.Id
left join MasterData unit on detail.UnitId = unit.Id
left join MasterData groupFee on fee.GroupId = groupFee.Id
left join MasterData otherUnit on detail.OtherUnitId = otherUnit.Id
where OtherFee = 1 and InquiryId = '{Id}'
group by pol.Name,detail.PolId,pod.Name,detail.PodId,detail.CurrencyId,curr.Code,detail.DescriptionId,fee.Name,otherUnit.Name,detail.GroupFee,groupFee.Enum
ORDER BY concat(pol.Name,pod.Name),groupFee.Enum ASC

${CLogo}   ${CCompanyName}
Address: ${CAddress}
Hotline:1900 3133
Email: 
   
Quotation
 Quote No : ${Quo No}
    Created At : ${Quo Date}
    Valid Until : ${Validity}
Company Name : ${Customer}   From ${nickname}
Address : ${addresscus}   Dept ${Department}
To : ${ContactName}   Tel ${telsales}
Title : ${JobTitles}   Email ${email}
Tel : ${telcus}          
Dear ${PIC}
Thank you for your continued interest in our services.
We're excited to present a customized sea freight quote tailored to your specific needs. Our competitive rates and comprehensive solutions will ensure a seamless shipping experience.
POL POD Carrier VIA TT FREQ
{POL} {POD} {Carrier} {VIA} {Tran}

{ScheduleIdsText}

 

Description Curr Unit Price VAT Remark
LCL 20 40 45
ROUTE: #{Pol} - #{Pod}
#{GroupFee}
{Description} {Curr} {Unit} {LCL} {Cont20} {Cont40} {Cont45}    


 

${Remark}

Components.Label: Print Draft
Components.Query: WITH hblnolist AS ( SELECT s.HblNo AS hblNos, SUM(s.Quantity) AS quanty, s.ContainerText textc, si.Id AS idinv FROM ShipmentInvoice si CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(si.HblIds, ',') AS split_hbl LEFT JOIN Shipment s ON s.Id = split_hbl.value where si.Id='{Id}' GROUP BY si.Id,s.Quantity,s.ContainerText,s.HblNo ), VAT AS ( SELECT (CASE WHEN ISNULL(smdt.Vat,0)=10 THEN ROUND(SUM(smdt.TotalAmount*smdt.ExchangeRateINV)*0.1,0) ELSE 0 END) AS tax10, (CASE WHEN ISNULL(smdt.Vat,0)=8 THEN ROUND(SUM(smdt.TotalAmount*smdt.ExchangeRateINV)*0.08,0) ELSE 0 END) AS tax8, CASE WHEN ISNULL(smdt.Vat,0)<0 THEN ABS(Vat) ELSE 0 END AS taxOT FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail smdt LEFT JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoice sminv ON smdt.ShipmentInvoiceId=sminv.Id WHERE sminv.Id='{Id}' GROUP BY smdt.Vat ), Amountbft AS ( SELECT SUM(dt3.TotalAmount*dt3.ExchangeRateINV) AS BFT FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail dt3 JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoice smv3 ON dt3.ShipmentInvoiceId=smv3.Id WHERE smv3.Id='{Id}' GROUP BY smv3.Id ) SELECT sminv.VoucherTypeId, cus.CompanyName AS Partnerv, ISNULL(cus.Address,'') AS addv, ISNULL(cus.PhoneNumber,'') AS Tel, ISNULL(cus.Fax,'') AS Fax, ISNULL(sminv.Code,'DRAFT') AS Invno, ISNULL(FORMAT(sminv.InvoiceDate,'dd MMM, yyyy'),'') AS Dateinv, sm.MblNo AS MBLNo, pol.Name AS POLName, POD.Name AS PODName, ISNULL(FORMAT(sm.EtdDate,'dd MMM'),'') AS ETD, ISNULL(FORMAT(sm.EtaDate,'dd MMM'),'') AS ETA, ISNULL(sm.Quantity,'') AS Volume, (ISNULL(sm.Vessel,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(sm.VesselVoy,'')) AS vessal , CASE WHEN sminv.RevisedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 'Revised Date: ' + ISNULL(FORMAT(sminv.RevisedDate,'dd MMM, yyy'),'') ELSE '' end AS Reviseddate, CASE WHEN sminv.InvoiceTypeId = 1 AND sminv.DebitAmount<0 THEN 'CREDIT NOTE' WHEN sminv.InvoiceTypeId = 1 AND sminv.DebitAmount>=0 THEN 'DEBIT NOTE' ELSE 'INVOICE' END AS Titles, CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN 'Original Curr' ELSE curr.Name END AS Currinv, FORMAT(CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE sminv.ExchangeRateINV END,'#,##.00') AS EXT, curr.Code, ISNULL(FORMAT(sminv.DueDate,'dd MMM, yy'),'') AS Duedate, (SELECT SUM(hblnolist.quanty) FROM hblnolist WHERE hblnolist.idinv=sminv.Id) AS Quantity1, (SELECT STRING_AGG(hblnolist.hblNos,'/') FROM hblnolist WHERE hblnolist.idinv=sminv.Id) AS HBLs, (SELECT STRING_AGG(hblnolist.textc,' & ') FROM hblnolist WHERE hblnolist.idinv=sminv.Id) AS conttext2, format((SELECT SUM(VAT.tax8) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax8 IS NOT NULL ),'N0') AS Tax8 , format((SELECT SUM(VAT.tax10) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax10 IS NOT NULL ),'N0') AS Tax10 , format((SELECT SUM(BFT) FROM Amountbft WHERE Amountbft.BFT IS NOT NULL),'N0') AS BFT, FORMAT(((SELECT SUM(VAT.tax8) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax8 IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(VAT.tax10) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax10 IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(BFT) FROM Amountbft WHERE Amountbft.BFT IS NOT NULL) ),'N0') AS TotalAFTAX, format((SELECT SUM(VAT.tax8) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax8 IS NOT NULL ) + (SELECT SUM(VAT.tax10) FROM VAT WHERE VAT.tax10 IS NOT NULL ),'N0') AS TotalVAT FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoice sminv LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner cus ON cus.Id=sminv.VendorIds LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON sm.Id = sminv.FileIds LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = sminv.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal pol ON pol.Id = sm.PolId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId WHERE sminv.Id='{Id}' SELECT FORMAT(CASE WHEN sminv.DebitAmount>= 0 AND dt.TypeId=2 THEN (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) * (-1) WHEN sminv.DebitAmount>= 0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN ( (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END)) WHEN sminv.DebitAmount< 0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) * (-1) ELSE (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) END,(CASE WHEN curr.Name='VND' THEN 'N0' ELSE 'N2' END)) AS AmountINV ,FORMAT((CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END),(CASE WHEN curr.Name='VND' THEN 'N0' ELSE 'N2' END)) AS Amountvnd, fee.Name AS namefee, unit.Name AS unit, format(dt.Quantity,'N{CQuantity}') AS Qty, FORMAT(dt.Amount,(CASE WHEN curdt.Name='VND' THEN 'N0' ELSE 'N2' END)) AS amountOG, curdt.Code AS curdt, format(dt.Vat,'N{CQuantity}') AS VAT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS Sott FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoice sminv LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner cus ON cus.Id=sminv.VendorIds LEFT JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail dt ON dt.ShipmentInvoiceId = sminv.Id LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON sm.Id = sminv.ShipmentId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = sminv.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.FeeType fee ON fee.Id=dt.DescriptionId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curdt ON curdt.Id=dt.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=dt.UnitId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal pol ON pol.Id = sm.PolId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId WHERE sminv.Id='{Id}' ORDER BY dt.[Order] ASC

Components.Label: VAT Invoice
Components.Query:
select *
from ShipmentFee
where ShipmentInvoiceId = '{ShipmentInvoiceId}' and InvoiceId is null
Components.ShowExp: this.EditForm.Entity.ActionId == 2 && this.Token.RoleNames.some(x => x.toUpperCase() == "CREATE VATINV FROM DEBIT")

Components.Label: ShipmentInvoiceDetail
Components.PreQuery:
{
    "HblIds": this.EditForm.Entity.HblIds.split(',').join("','"),
    "MblIds": this.EditForm.Entity.FileIds.split(',').join("','"),
    "VendorIds": this.EditForm.Entity.VendorIds,
    "ShipmentInvoiceId": this.EditForm.Entity.Id,
    "ExchangeRateINV": this.EditForm.Entity.ExchangeRateINV || 1,
    "ExchangeRateINV2": this.EditForm.Entity.ExchangeRateINV2 || 1,
    "ObhTypeId": this.EditForm.Entity.ObhTypeId,
    "FeeTypeId": this.EditForm.Entity.FeeTypeId,
    "Currency": this.EditForm.Entity.Currency ? this.EditForm.Entity.Currency.Code : 'VND',
    "CurrencyId": this.EditForm.Entity.CurrencyId
}
